Weapons.affix: Teleport no longer has a cooldown but costs 25 Arcane Power.
Chance on killing a demon to gain a random Shrine effect.
Every successful block has a 25% chance to reduce all cooldowns by 1 second.
Akarat's Champion gains the effects of the Prophet and Embodiment of Power runes
Each enemy hit by your Blessed Shield increases the damage of your Blessed Shield by 40% for 3 seconds
Attacking with Whirlwind also applies Rend, and total damage of Rend is dealt over 1 second.
Zombie Dogs stuns enemies around them for 1.5 seconds when summoned.
Weapon Throw generates up to 20 additional Fury based on how far away the enemy hit is. Maximum benefit when the enemy hit is 20 or more yards away.
Heal for 4% of your missing Life when you kill an Undead enemy.

Elemental Arrow gains an effect based on the rune: Ball Lightning now travels at 30% speed. Frost Arrow damage and Chilled duration increased by 250%. Immolation Arrow ground damage over time increased by 250%. Lightning Bolts damage and Stun duration increased by 250%. Nether Tentacles damage and healing amount increased by 250%.
Undead and Demon enemies within 25 yards take 650% weapon damage as Holy every second and are sometimes knocked into the air.
The damage of Tempest Rush is increased by 600% and when your Tempest Rush hits 3 or fewer enemies, it gains 100% Critical Hit Chance
Enemies killed while Akarat's Champion is active turn into Phalanx Avatars for 10 seconds.
Frenzy now stacks up to 10 times and hits additional time per stack. Each additional hit will chain to any enemies within 15 yards, and the damage is split between all of the affected enemies.
Two Condemned enemies also trigger Condemn's explosion and the damage of Condemn is increased by 800%.
War Cry and Threatening Shout cause an Avalanche and Earthquake
Bash consumes up to 40 Fury to deal up to 500% increased damage
Grants a 20% chance to block attacks. Blocked attacks inflict 30% less damage. After blocking an attack, your next attack inflicts 30% additional damage.
Death Nova deals 400% increased damage for every enemy within 25 yards.
You may have 2 additional Sentries.
The damage bonus of Command Skeletons increases by 30% per second they spend attacking the same target. This effect stacks up to 60 times.
Chance on hit to summon a herd of murderous cows.
Your projectiles pierce 2 additional times.
Killing enemies and destroying objects has a chance to grant 20% of your maximum primary resource
The Butcher still inhabits his carver.
Automatically cast Marked for Death when you damage an enemy.
Falling Sword can be used again within 4 seconds before the cooldown is triggered.
Your Spike Traps lure enemies to them. Enemies may be taunted once every 12 seconds.
50% chance to cast a fireball when attacking.
50% chance to cluck when attacking.
Teleport gains the effect of the Wormhole rune.
You take 60% less damage from blocked attacks.
Dashing Strike reduces your damage taken by 50% for 6 seconds.
Vault gains the effect of the Rattling Roll rune.
Leave a clone of yourself behind after using Vault.
Fist of the Heavens now casts twice and deals 1,000% damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Vengeance by 65%
Multishot hits enemies below 60% health twice and its damage is increased by 200%.
Grasp of the Dead gains the effect of the Rain of Corpses rune.
While channeling Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost for at least 1 second, all damage is increased by 325%
Blocks have a chance of summoning a charging wolf that deals 1000% weapon damage to all enemies it passes through.
65% chance to shoot explosive bolts when attacking.
Each enemy hit by your Sweep Attack increases the damage of your next Sweep Attack by 125%, stacking up to 5 times.
Cleave deals up to 400% increased damage based on percentage on missing Fury.
Reduces the cooldown of Heaven's Fury by 50%.
Slaying enemies engulf the wielder into Frenzy.
Bolas now explode instantly.
Gain 100% Critical Hit Chance against enemies at full health

While channeling Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost for at least 1 second, the damage of your Arcane Power spenders is increased by 150%, and you also cast one of your other damaging Arcane Power spenders every second.
Attacking enemies below 20% Life freezes them for 3 seconds.
Each enemy hit by Falling Sword increases the damage of Blessed Hammer by 80% for 10 seconds. Max 10 stacks.
Heavenâ€™s Fury gains two additional rays and has its damage increased by 500%.
Seismic Slam attack 50% faster and deals 150% increased damage against Slowed of Chilled enemies.
Your Shield Glare deals damage equal to up to your last 5 Shield Bash casts.
Dashing Strike increases the damage of Dashing Strike by 100% for 1 second, stacking up to 5 times.
Chance to double your attack speed when attacking.
Attacks grant you an absorb shield for 3% of your maximum Life. Stacks up to 10 times
Spectral Blade attacks 50% faster and deals 200% increased damage.
Blocking an attack has a chance to Freeze the attacker for 1.5 seconds.
Condemn has no cooldown and its damage increased by 800%, but instead costs 40 Wrath.
Lightning damage has a chance to turn enemies into lightning rods, causing them to pulse 555% weapon damage as Lightning every second to nearby enemies for 6 seconds.
Siphon Blood drains blood from 2 additional targets.
Reduces the Fury cost of Seismic Slam by 50% and increases its damage by 500%.
Spirit Barrage gains the Phantasm rune. Each active Phantasm lasts twice as long and increases the damage of Spirit Barrage by 150%, and also increases attack rate from Manitou spectre.
Chance to summon a ghostly Fallen Champion when attacking.
Reduces the cooldown of Slow Time by 40%.
Sweep Attack restores 6 Wrath for each enemy hit and it has its damage increased by 300%.
Smite now jumps to 3 additional enemies.
Blessed Hammer damage is increased by 250% for the first 3 enemies it hits.
Removes the resource cost of Blessed Shield and increases its damage by 350%.
100% of your Thorns damage is applied on every attack.
Iron Skin also increases your Block Amount by 60%.
Chance to root enemies to the ground when you hit them.
Gain 10% increased damage while wielding a two-handed weapon.
10% chance on hit to summon a Spike Trap, Caltrops or Sentry
The first time an enemy deals damage to you, reduce that damage by 80% and Charm the enemy for 3 seconds.
Impale throws two additional knices.
A Zombie Dog is automatically summoned to your side every 2 seconds.
Your skill cooldowns are reduced by 10 seconds for 15 seconds after killing an elite pack.

Blocks release forward a Fires of Heaven.

Each different poison skill cast increases the damage of all poison skills by 100% for 15 seconds.
Your primary skills attack 50% faster and deal 200% increased damage
40% chance to Chain Lightning enemies when you hit them.
Enemies snared by your Entangling Shot take 25% increased damage from all sources.

Reduces the Wrath cost of Shield Bash by 50%.
Elemental Exposure's damage bonus per stack is creased to 10%
50% chance to lob an acid blob when attacking.
Spirit spenders that teleport you while Epiphany is active are also mimicked on a nearby target for free.
Every point of Maximum Essence increases your damage by 0.5% and Bone Spikes generate 5 additional Essence for each enemy hit.
While both Wrath of the Berserker and Call of the Ancients are active, Hammer of the Ancients deals 250% increased damage.

Blocked attacks heal you and your allies for 30% of the amount blocked

45% chance when attacking to explode with demonic fury for 1,800-2,000% weapon damage as Fire.
Reduces the Mana cost of Zombie Charger by 50%.
Secondary skills deal 400% additional damage while Bone Armor is active but reduce the remaining duration of Bone Armor by 4 seconds.
You may have one extra Hydra active at a time and thy deal 300% increased damage.
Slain enemies rest in pieces.
Elemental skills have a chance to trigger a powerful attack that deals 250% weapon damage:Cold skills trigger Freezing Skull, Poison skills trigger Poison Nova Lightning skills trigger Charged Bolt
Each time an enemy takes damage from your Heaven's Fury, it increases the damage they take from your Heaven's Fury by 20%. This effect stacks up to 20 times.
Spirit Walk lasts until you attack or until an enemy is within 30 yards of you.
Rapid Fire no longer has a channel cost and deals 300% increased damage.
20% chance to Smite enemies for 600-750% weapon damage as Lightning when you hit them.
Chance to summon angelic assistance when attacking.
Every 60 seconds, gain a random Law for 60 seconds.
This wand finds your death humorous.
Critical Hits have a 4% chance to spawn a health globe.
When you kill an enemy, it explodes for 600% of your Life per Kill as damage to all enemies within 20 yards. You no longer benefit from your Life per Kill

Non-cleaving Gargantuans gain the cleave and chilling effects of the Humongoid rune.

Lightning damage is increased by 15% for every 10 yards you are from target up to maximum of 40 yards.
Reduce the cooldown of Fetish Army and Big Bad Voodoo by 1 second each time your fetishes deal damage.

50% chance to sunder the ground your enemies walk on when you attack.
Doubles the duration of Steed Charge.
Chakram deals 1.4% increased damage for each point of Hatred you have

25% chance to drag enemies to you when attacking.

Horrify causes you to Fear and Root enemies around you for 8 seconds.
Spike Traps gain Impaling Spines rune and are deployed twice as fast.
Wave of Light is now cast at your enemy.
Your primary skills heal you for 6% of your missing life
Double the number of enemies your Electrocute jumps to.
Furious Charge deals 35% increased damage for every enemy hit while charging.
Summon a Fetish Army after you kill 2 Elites.
Vengeance gains the effect of the Dark Heart rune.
Reduce the cooldown and increase the damage of Phalanx by 60%
Every time you destroy a wreckable object, you gain a short burst of speed.
Your Hatred Generators reduce your damage taken by 50% for 5 seconds.
You take 9% less damage for each Companion you have active.
